body.name: Smart Watch, Newest 1.85 "TFT HD Display Smart Watch with Receive & Dial, Smart Watch for Android iPhone with Pedometer, Fitness Tracker, Heart Rate, SMS Reminder, Android Smart Watch for Women Men

features: 【Answer/Make Calls and Message Notifications】After connecting to Bluetooth, you can directly dial the phone number on the watch to answer the call, and you can synchronize the address book and call records. Thanks to the built-in microphone and speaker, you can answer/make/reject calls (and also play music) on the spot from your wrist, allowing you to exercise hands-free and smarter than any other watch in its class. Can receive SMS and APP messages (Note: cannot reply to messages).

【Newest 1.85" Large Screen & Multiple Faces】Using the latest Technology, this smart watch for android ios phone is equipped with a 1.85 inch 240x286 ultra-clear full touch color screen, which makes men's women's fitness watch more fashionable and durable. We have carefully designed a beautiful UI and multi-dial faces for you, so that you can switch the dial style through the App at any time according to your mood and occasion.

【Reading Information Notifications】The smart watch can receive text messages and real-time reminder notifications from apps, such as WhatsAPP /Text /Facebook /Twitter /Message. It is convenient for you to view information while you are busy at work. (Reminder: You can only receive reminders for messages and app messages, but you cannot reply to messages).

【24-Hour Health Monitoring/Multiple Sports Modes】The upgraded smart watch gives you 24-hour real-time heart rate and records all-day activities such as steps, calories burned, miles walked, minutes of activity. It also supports multiple exercise modes and tracks all your workout distances and fitness during exercise. Learn more about your health!

【Smartwatch Compatibility for Android iOS Phones】The smartwatch is compatible with iOS 9.0 and above or Android 4.0 and above smartphones. With Ai voice assistant, SMS notification reminder, music playback, multiple sports monitoring, female physiological monitoring and reminder, weather forecast, IP67 waterproof life, remote control photography, sedentary reminder, calculator, alarm, stopwatch, timer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Great Smart Watch
reviews.reviewText: My husband wanted a smart watch but didn’t want to pay a hundred + dollars for one. He researched and found this one. He has had it for several months. Uses it daily. He recommended to some friends and they purchased one also. It more than meets his needs. We are impressed with the watch for the inexpensive price. Many features are comparable to more expensive watches. Outgoing/incoming calls, receives text messages, monitors heart rates, calculator, camera, weather, pedometer and more. It has a nice bright screen. Quite a long battery life that lasts several days. It’s was an easy setup with the app on a Samsung s20. Only downside is that it cannot send text messages. But not a problem since he would rather send them from his phone. This smart watch is beyond expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars amazing product with plenty of features
reviews.reviewText: I have to admit I was greatly surprised by this product. I can't image how the manufacture can pull it off under 50 bucks. The watch feels smooth with a nice mate finish. The band is very comfortable. Battery is amazing. I have used it two full days and it still shows almost full bar. Phone call is seamless with good volume. I can customize the notifications to include email, messages, individual apps. Alarm works fine. It will be perfect if the alarm can be snoozed after its set off. Over two dozen watch faces can be selected. Sometimes I want it techie, and other times I want it classy. No problem. Continuously heat rate monitoring is a plus. I also like the navigation. Just swipe from one of the four edges and it will bring up the menus accordingly.If you on a budget, don't care a name brand, and don't want to charge the watch every day, this is a safe choice. Hight sugguested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality for the price nice Christmas present!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Full of glitches
reviews.reviewText: I've had this watch for a couple days and I'm sending it back. Though it's paired with my phone, the watch keeps saying it's not paired. Some of the things like watch faces could be changed with the app, but it wasn't paired to see the weather or play music and gives a pairing error.The first time I set it up I could see the weather. The next day I looked again and it showed the weather for another state. No matter what I did I couldn't get it to change back. I checked the IP on my phone and it was correct. My location and GPS were on. Finally I reset the watch, that's when things really went bad. Every time I tried to look at the watch face it kept making me pick my language. Then it would tell me to download the app to my phone and wouldn't let me go any further. I reset this watch over and over and it was just stuck. I rebooted my phone, I unpaired and repaired the watch. I restarted the watch. Nothing worked.I had the screen protector on it and I couldn't get the touch screen to really work either. Nothing would slide. I was afraid I'd break the watch, since I had to press so hard.You can only store one watch face in the watch. To change the face, you have to use the app in your phone. You can make your own face with the digital time but you can't crop the picture so the placement of the time might cover the picture. You can't use your own picture with a watch face with hands. You can't slide the time with your finger to place it where you want. It gives you the option of using the corners or the middle. The time digits can't be resized.Overall I just wasn't satisfied. I think it was dying. Buy at your own risk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Watch
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with my watch and also the customer service provided by this company. I had several questions about this watch that I didn't find in the comments or description. The company was quick to answer my questions thoroughly and completely.I will share the things that most concerned me:You can download personal pictures and put them on the home screen - see the pic of my doggo.The watchband can be changed - I need a clasp style due to arthritic hands.There is an option to change the menu style to better suit your needs.The watch keeps perfect time. And the alarm works well.The Bluetooth communication between phone and watch works very well and the speaker is very good.The battery is great - charges quickly and holds that charge for days.The safety screen protector is a nice addition, and it does not hinder the use of the touchscreen.This watch is very customizable. This is the third watch of this kind that I've owned, and the best so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for a few months now and am really liking it. It seems to be pretty close on the distance when I go walking a known route. It's always close each time on the same trails. It does pretty much what it says it does. I love the amount of faces you can change it to. It's like getting a new watch each time. The controls are where you would expect them to be and logically placed. Battery life is really good and charges very quickly. I've tried a couple different ones and this is my favorite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay, I guess
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this is a decent enough watch.Upside: The battery life is great and the screen is easy to read. Once you figure out how it works it is easy enough to navigate. It charges easily and fast.Downside: It will not connect my text messages and that's hugely frustrating. It was one of the reasons I wanted a smart watch. Several days the watch did not send/save my pedometer data and it was gone forever. The app is basic, but options are disappointing. I reloaded the app and went through all the steps that tech support said, but the watch just won't show texts. It does connect and show FB messages though. . My husband bought a different brand of smart watch and I am returning mine to use that one instead.

The media could not be loaded. Bought this for my daughter as she wanted a smart-watch. I was so impressed by the value of the price and quality that you get that I decided to buy a watch for me too. The battery lasts a very long time (about a week or roughly 8 or so days) and it charges really fast, you can put your own custom picture on the face of the watch, comes with all the apps you need and the phone app is really user-friendly and easy to setup with your watch.I can customize anything I want on this. I get phone notifications, messenger or TikTok notifications, and so on. I even got some family and friends around me to go and buy one since they've seen our watches. Shipping was really fast and efficient as well.I highly recommend this watch as it's serving us really well. 5 stars for sure.
The product is good and has the features it described, work on Android devices.

reviews.reviewTitle: 血圧計がついていたらなお良し
reviews.reviewText: 最初接続がうまくいかず、初期化して対応しました。アプリのダウンロードも2回ほどやり直ししました。時計のカバーはこれは日っとものですね、普通はシールを張り付けるタイプが多いのですが、すぐにダメになりますので。性能的には良いと思います、慾を言えば血圧が計れて睡眠時間が計測できる機能が欲しかったです。全体の大きさは満足できるものでした。電池の充電はバッテリー強化してもう少し大きめでもいいかもです。
Great little watch, only complaint is that you need to be in Bluetooth range to your phone
